title: Replace Pronouns with Placeholders Utility
description: Add reusable utility to replace actual pronoun values with placeholder text (<pronoun>, <possessive pronoun>) across personalized and final comments. Includes button in bulk upload modal and add/edit components.

complexity.reasoning: Small, self-contained feature with 6-8 user stories, 1-2 weeks effort, straightforward utility function + 2-3 component updates, no external integrations (uses existing pronoun endpoint), minimal technical complexity
